trending_topics.title: Gaganyaan-2: India's Historic Moon Bound Announcement

scenes.text: Today, January 28, 2026, ISRO Chairman announced from Sriharikota, Andhra Pradesh, that Gaganyaan-2 is set for a lunar flyby.
The mission marks a milestone as India prepares to send three Vyomanauts, including a woman pilot, into deep space for the first time.
This mission signifies India's growing dominance in the global space race. Tune in with us for more such news as we track this journey!

trending_topics.title: 6G Breakthrough in Bengaluru: A Global Speed Record

scenes.text: In a major tech breakthrough today in Bengaluru, India's Silicon Valley, the national 6G testbed achieved speeds of 1 Terabit per second.
The Ministry of Electronics reported this speed is 100 times faster than 5G, promising a future of instant holographic communication.
India is now leading the global 6G patent race. Tune in with us for more such news on the digital revolution!

trending_topics.title: Viral Rescue at Mudumalai: Nature's Heartwarming Moment

scenes.text: Reports from the Mudumalai Tiger Reserve in Tamil Nadu today highlight a viral rescue of an orphaned elephant calf by forest rangers.
Local authorities are using new AI-tracking collars to monitor the calf's integration into a new herd to ensure its long-term survival.
This success story shows the power of technology in wildlife conservation. Tune in with us for more such news from the wild!
